elements.name: Intro
elements.html:
2022 Spring Facilitator Summit Post-Event Survey

We are interested in learning about all facilitators' experiences during the 2022 Summit. Your responses will be shared anonymously with Code.org staff and co-leads running these workshops to help inform summits and other professional learning opportunities in the future. Thank you for taking a few minutes to complete this survey!

elements.name: Course
elements.title: For which course(s) did you attend the 2022 Spring Facilitator Summit?

elements.name: scheduled_to_facilitate
elements.title: Are you scheduled to lead a 6-12 5-day workshop or K-5 Intro workshop this summer (May - August)?

elements.name: facilitator_experience
elements.title: Will 2022 be the first summer where you facilitate the Code.org 5-day summer workshop?

elements.name: iFeel
elements.title: I feel more prepared to lead Code.org's {Course} Professional Learning workshops in 2022-23 than I did before this event.

elements.name: connect_facilitator_community
elements.title: Overall, to what extent do you feel connected to the facilitator community after this event?

elements.name: useful_practice
elements.title: What was the most useful thing you learned at this event and why?

elements.name: activities
elements.title: Overall, to what extent did you find the faclitator summit activities engaging?

elements.name: engaging_most
elements.title: What was most engaging for you during the facilitator summit?

elements.name: engaging_least
elements.title: What was least engaging for you during the facilitator summit?

elements.name: ifThere23
elements.title: If there is anything you would like us to know, please use this space to share.

elements.name: permission
elements.title: I give Code.org permission to quote my written feedback from today for use on social media, promotional materials, and other communications.

choices.text: Yes, I give Code.org permission to quote me.
No, I do not give Code.org my permission.

elements.name: question2
elements.html: Thank you for sharing your responses! If you have any questions about this survey, please contact facilitators@code.org.
